lead_paragraph: Ben Stokes can recover to become one of England's best ever players after his World Twenty20 nightmare when he was hit for four sixes in the last over of the final, team mate Stuart Broad said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Stokes Can Recover to Be Among England's Best Ever-Broad
headline.main: Stokes Can Recover to Be Among England's Best Ever-Broad

snippet: Ben Stokes can recover to become one of England's best ever players after his World Twenty20 nightmare when he was hit for four sixes in the last over of the final, team mate Stuart Broad said on Wednesday....
